description: AWS Amplify - full-stack web and mobile app development platform

common_errors.solution: Check build logs in Amplify Console, verify package.json scripts, review build settings
Review deployment logs, check file permissions, verify artifact output directory
Check Cognito user pool configuration, verify user credentials, review auth flow settings
Check API endpoint configuration, verify API key/IAM permissions, review CORS settings
Check S3 bucket permissions, verify Cognito identity pool role has S3 access, review storage rules
Run 'amplify configure', verify AWS credentials, check Node.js version compatibility

common_errors.cause: Local and cloud Amplify resources are out of sync
common_errors.solution: Run 'amplify pull' to sync, resolve conflicts manually, use 'amplify push --force' if needed

common_errors.cause: Git repository webhook or authentication issue
common_errors.solution: Reconnect repository in Amplify Console, verify webhook URL, check repository access token

common_errors.cause: Custom domain configuration or SSL certificate issue
common_errors.solution: Add CNAME records for DNS validation, wait for certificate validation, check domain ownership
Add environment variables in Amplify Console Build settings, prefix with REACT_APP_ for CRA
